name: Slimeshift LD35
description:
A very simple game about shapeshifting slimes that explore dungeons without the player's control.

This is more of a concept than a real, concrete game. Beware: bad programmer art!

Unfortunately, I didn't have nearly enough time to polish and improve on this game because of work-related stuff, but I really wanted to try at least SOMETHING for Ludum Dare, since I never participated in a game jam before.

The more important part, however, is that I learned quite a lot about some of the tools I used (such as DOTween, an AMAZING Unity tweener). I'm definitely going to try something better next time :)
